---
title: "What is a BioBlitz?"
---

A BioBlitz is a community-wide intensive biological collection event conducted over a specified period of time. This year, the Davis Backyard Museum BioBlitz will take place from **February 18th, 2023** to **March 18th, 2023** with introductory events taking place on February 18th. Participants will be able to post their observations to the community science platform, iNaturalist, for the entire month.

More info and a schedule of events to follow.
